solution_line_template: The total number of male adults and children is {children_present}+{male_adults} = <<{children_present}+{male_adults}={total_male_adults_children}>>{total_male_adults_children} people.
The number of females is {total_people}-{total_male_adults_children} = <<{total_people}-{total_male_adults_children}={female_adults}>>{female_adults} female adults.
